property.name: SearchEverywhereHistoryKey
property.value: manual_buttons PSI JAVA://name.cantanima.chineseremainderclock.R.id#manual_buttons title_activity_settings PSI JAVA://name.cantanima.chineseremainderclock.R.string#title_activity_settings title_activity PSI JAVA://name.cantanima.chineseremainderclock.R.string#title_activity_settings putBoolean PSI JAVA://android.os.BaseBundle#putBoolean watch ACTION ToggleFieldBreakpoint show_time PSI JAVA://name.cantanima.chineseremainderclock.Clock_Drawer#show_time onPrefer PSI JAVA://name.cantanima.chineseremainderclock.Chinese_Remainder#onSharedPreferenceChanged anadig PSI JAVA://name.cantanima.chineseremainderclock.R.string#saved_anadig line num null null CRC_View PSI JAVA://name.cantanima.chineseremainderclock.CRC_View avd ACTION Android.RunAndroidAvdManager

task.summary: Default task
Implemented the hiding of seconds. Fixed bug when rotating device when settings are activated. Added a toggle to reverse the units when drawing (not implemented yet).
Implemented reversal of units and hiding of seconds.
Added a color picker, modified preferences accordingly, added a time display that differs from the old one.
Adjusted design sizes, modified time display, updated help file, fixed a bug in the preferences settings.
Touch support for Bally! Reformatted some files with indent = 2 spaces, rather than 4.
Found a bug with touch & drag in 8-hour time. Fixed. Added a note in the help about manual changes.
Corrected error in displaying 24-hour time, apparently introduced with settings panel.
Welcome screen, new design for Archy, and changed menu to toolbar.
quiz mode! fixed broken launcher icon, too. maybe something else, which I can't recollect
modified quiz dialog to make clock easier to view
implemented custom time dialog, a number of minor changes suggested by Antonella
significant amount of javadoc-based code documentation, fixed a bug when entering time, slight simplification of CRC_View by eliminating an unused field
completed and generated documentation, patched a small bug related to quiz display
Changed Archy's animation so that arches grow or shrink rather than fade in or out. Renamed Bally to Ringy.
Bug fixes and other small changes, mainly discovered or requested by Antonella.
A few small changes/fixes here and there.
Fixed bug in quiz mode identified by Antonella. (Seconds rings still showed up in Ringy.)
Modularized quiz and added toasts. Also fixed a bug where the box decoration for a LinearLayout did not disappear.
Added Italian translation by Antonella Perucca. A few other minor tweaks.
Corrections to mistakes in the translation as found by Antonella.

Added matematikon graphic. Replaced

by

in Help files.
Updated SDK to most current version (26.1.0) and removed a bug in the default preference for the clock design, heretofore unnoticed.
Slight change in translation.
New quizzes and a mild change to Archy's design.
Another quiz, some touch-up to the code.
A bunch of debugging and touch-up of both source code and graphics.
Now we are dreaming. :-)
Mostly some changes requested by Antonella. A few tweaks here and there, too.
some bug fixes and improvements
Horrible preferences bug fixed. Also removed the switch for manual/automatic mode and introduced a menu option for the same thing.
Fixed a couple of small bugs in the Clock Master quiz.
Added the NumberArray interface to replace FlexibleNumberPicker in some places. Testing.
Added Twohanded_Clock for use in quizzes. Some other minor fixes.
Changed Clock_Entry to Dial_Entry, which is more general, and replaced all previous methods of entering numbers (FlexibleNumberPicker, TextArray) with a Dial_Entry. A few other fixes here and there.
The beginnings of a Russian translation. A few additional tweaks to quizzes.
Gave bubbly some manual manipulation. This meant a few changes to other things. Plus, some changes requested by Antonella.
Some more tweaks and a new icon for the menu.
German translations. More tweaks.
New Italian translations. Tweak to Ringy per Antonella's excellent suggestion.
The beginnings of a manual mode for Vertie, with a refactoring that generalizes and systematizes what Ringy and Bubbly had already done. Some tweaks to translations.
Vertie is fully manual via dragging. Adjustment to Italian translation.
Linus is fully manual via dragging. Both Linus and Vertie now extend a new abstract class, CRC_View_Polygonal, which implements most of the manual code.
Added a toast message for all drawers when they switch to manual mode. Shady is now manual but still have some bugs to work out.
Debugged Shady's manual mode.
Archy is now manual. Also changed Ringy's background to be a path, so that draw() draws a pre-computed path instead of computing all the addresses and so forth on each call.
New user interface element for manually adjusting time, replacing the old, inelegant method of selecting the unit before modifying it. A few more fixes hither, thither, and yon.
Squashed a really nasty bug that popped up when using the Daydream service.
Preferences now show a preview of the clock.
Some changes requested by Antonella.

A bunch of debugging and touch-up of both source code and graphics.
Now we are dreaming. :-)

some bug fixes and improvements
Horrible preferences bug fixed. Also removed the switch for manual/automatic mode and introduced a menu option for the same thing.

Added the NumberArray interface to replace FlexibleNumberPicker in some places. Testing.
Added Twohanded_Clock for use in quizzes. Some other minor fixes.
Changed Clock_Entry to Dial_Entry, which is more general, and replaced all previous methods of entering numbers (FlexibleNumberPicker, TextArray) with a Dial_Entry. A few other fixes here and there.

Vertie is fully manual via dragging. Adjustment to Italian translation.

Added a toast message for all drawers when they switch to manual mode. Shady is now manual but still have some bugs to work out.
Debugged Shady's manual mode.
Archy is now manual. Also changed Ringy's background to be a path, so that draw() draws a pre-computed path instead of computing all the addresses and so forth on each call.
New user interface element for manually adjusting time, replacing the old, inelegant method of selecting the unit before modifying it. A few more fixes hither, thither, and yon.
Squashed a really nasty bug that popped up when using the Daydream service.
Preferences now show a preview of the clock.
Some changes requested by Antonella.
